statements: DELETE FROM word_frequency WHERE document_id = 100 AND word = 'apple';
DELETE FROM WordFrequency WHERE document_id = 1 AND frequency > 5;
DELETE FROM TextDocuments WHERE document_id IN (SELECT document_id FROM WordFrequency WHERE frequency < 3);
DELETE FROM word_frequencies WHERE document_id = 2 AND word_id = 3;
DELETE FROM word_frequencies WHERE document_id = 1 AND word_id = 3;
DELETE FROM words WHERE word = 'example' AND frequency > 5;
